trs: Only: ‘Drunk, it is important for us to return home as soon as possible.

rightsholder: Burukina, Irina. 2020. Mandative verbs and deontic modals in Russian: Between obligatory control and overt embedded subjects. Glossa: a journal of general linguistics 5(1). Open Library of Humanities.
trs: Only: ‘For János it is important to appear at the ceremony and for Mari it is also important that she will appear at the ceremony.
